name: Consumption (dyoungbird)
description:
Made for Dallas Society of Play Trick-or-Treat Game Jam 2021 Controls
  • WASD for Movement
  • 'E' to interact and skip dialogue
  • Mouse to move light and pick dialogue options

Investigate the latest consumption case in this short horror experience.

Using More Mountains Top Down Engine & Assets
